fhdackdj
   1987 wxl 15 ork m%dfoaYSh iNd mkf;a 152 jk j.ka;sfha (I) jk Wm j.ka;sfhka m%dfoaYSh iNdj,g ,eî we;s n,;, 
m%ldr" tlS mkf;a fyda tA hgf;a idok ,o hï w;=re jHia:djl úê úOdk hgf;a n,m;%hla ,nd .ekSu fyda tlS mkf;a 
150 jk j.ka;sh hgf;a hï l¾udka; noaola f.ùu wjYH fkdjkakd jQ lsishï jHdmdrhla" jD;a;Shla n<msáh m%dfoaYSh 
iNd n, m%foaYh we;=<; 2019 j¾Ifha § lrf.k hkq ,enk iEu ;ek;af;l=f.a u" tlS jHdmdrfha" jD;a;Sfha ,eîï fuys 
my; Wmf,aLkfha I jk ;Srefõ ksrEms; hï úIhdxlhl iSudjka we;=<; mj;akd wjia:djl tys II jk ;Srefõ wkqrEm
